title: Rotation change

replies.body:
A big rotation changed a couple weeks back. Some small maps get added in the rotation pretty often. I like the idea of letting the players decide which maps should be added and removed. Maybe the mapdevs could decide a system of maybe adding a map, and removing a map every week! They could make polls what the players want.

By the way, you posted this in the wrong subforum.
